task.title: How to build custom rules
task.shortdesc: Here you will get instructions about how to build custom rules.

taskbody.prereq:
To successfully build custom rules:
You must be logged into the application.
You must have access to create custom automation rules.
Have a clear idea of the processes to define triggers, conditions, and actions properly.

step.cmd: Click Create New Rule under Automations.

ul.li: Trigger: Task moved to “Ready for Review"

example.p: When a blog is moved to “Ready for Review,” QA is auto-notified and a compliance checklist is added.
